pages.title: 🗡 Brusier
pages.text: $(#25228d)Charges, then either throws their hammer, or smashes the ground.

text: $(#bd951a)Smash Radius: $()$(#ff0000)2.5 Blocks, center is 1.5 blocks in front.
$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Immune to Fire. The first 1.5s of the attack is charging, then decides if Smash or Hammer after.
$(br)$(#bd951a)He learned the hammer-throwing technique from certain turtle siblings.
